lines.text: What language was that you were speaking?
How did you and Victoria come to speak Spanish?
It is what we speak at home.
Oh, your family came from Spain?
They must have some good memories.
What did your family think about you joining the RAF?

Well, my mother died long before that. My brother 'n' sister didn't have opinion. My, my father was disappointed. He's a pacifist. I was bound to disappoint my father. Joining up just got it over with nice and quick.
I had to see you one last time. I must look...
Adorable. Damn it, why can't you look terrible? I've been out walking the streets trying to convince myself I wasn't in love with you and I come back here and you're barefoot and you're adorable.
My father believes God is just and merciful and the world can be remade in his image.
I think God has a lot to answer for. And I don't think you can change the world; not much anyway.
